sentences.sContent: "Trump has exposed the inadequacy and fallibility of decades-old domestic political strategy of governing by polls and contrived expectations, " she said.
sentences.sContent_eng: "Trump has exposed the inadequacy and fallibility of decades-old domestic political strategy of governing by polls and contrived expectations, " she said.
sentences.sCn: “几十年来，美国用民调和设想中的期望来治国，特朗普已经暴露了这种政治策略的不足和不可靠之处，”她说。
